original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽22.7. Kusalattika, Saññojanagocchakādi🔽Nakusalaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika saññojana gocchaka ādi  na kusalam no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: The reverse order of the dependent origination, the text of the Paṭṭhāna in triplets and couplets

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam no gantham dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam no ogham dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Triad of the Wholesome, the Sphere of the Fetters, etc.

original: Nakusalaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam no yogam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
